scripts.check: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check
scripts.check:fix: npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.check:all: npm run lint:check && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && npm run stylelint:check && npm run type-check:strict && npm run security:check
scripts.check:all:fix: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run stylelint
scripts.bundle:size: npm run build && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.html || echo 'Bundle size check completed'
scripts.circular-deps: npx madge --circular --extensions ts,js,vue src/ || echo 'Circular dependencies check completed'
scripts.duplicate-code: npx jscpd src/ --min-lines 10 --min-tokens 50 || echo 'Duplicate code check completed'
scripts.quality:comprehensive: npm run check:all && npm run bundle:size && npm run circular-deps && npm run duplicate-code
scripts.quality:report: npm run quality:comprehensive && echo 'Comprehensive quality report generated'
scripts.test: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run
scripts.test:unit: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run tests/unit
scripts.test:integration: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run tests/integration
scripts.test:e2e: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && playwright test
scripts.test:all: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run tests/unit tests/integration tests/e2e
scripts.test:coverage: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run --coverage
scripts.test:debug: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:performance: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:coverage:performance: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && vitest run --coverage --reporter=verbose
scripts.test:e2e:ui: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && playwright test --ui
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run check:all && npm run build:check && playwright test --debug
